comment_body: Kronik, I like it, but I think the reveal is a bit on the nose. The ending feels a bit rushed too. Maybe a slow reveal implying that they ate Toby is better instead?
For more horror check out, r/KronikNightmares

I really appreciate the honest criticism Simba. Thank you for your honesty :)

Feedback like this really helps, and I will do better next time.
